reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Supporting China to further develop and open up its commodities derivatives market, through an initial focus in Guangdong province

description.narrative: The project is designed to support China to further develop and open up its commodities derivatives market, though an initial focus on Guangdong province. It is intended that, by December 2017, Guangdong government will introduce practical plans aimed at the further opening of commodities futures, especially precious metals and non-ferrous metals, to international markets as part of the wider strategy of internationalising the RMB. This will benefit China and provide better access to Chinese capital markets for international (including UK) investors.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
